name: Orbital Attack
description:
A Train Jam 2019 Game

Join up to three of your friends and play this fast paced, competitive shoot 'em up. Can you master orbiting your ring to dodge the barrage of fire from your opponents?

Made by Tyler Samson, Monica Schmit, Sullivan Schattie, and Nick Grammatico
